IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIP ASSISTANCE FOR A COLLEGE EDUCATION TO THE DEPENDENT CHILDREN OF ELIGIBLE MEMBERS OF LOCAL UNION NO. 1 OF THE INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF BRIDGE, STRUCTURAL, AND ORNAMENTAL IRON WORKERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AS OF JUNE 30, 2022, THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN POSTIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY (OR ASSET) OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ADRIAN AND TIM CABALLERO ARE COUSINS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DESIGNATED TRUSTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED. IN ADDITION, FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE ENTIRE BOARD FOR THEIR REVIEW UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TRUSTEES ARE GOVERNED BY THE TRUST DOCUMENT AND HAVE A FIDUCIARY RESPONSIBILITY UNDER ERISA TO ADMINISTER THE PLAN IN THE BEST INTEREST OF THE MEMBERSHIP. THE US DEPARTMENT OF LABOR REQUIRES ALL LABOR TRUSTEES TO REPORT ON FORM LM-30 POTENTIAL SITUATIONS WHERE THERE MAY BE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THIS INFORMATION IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A SUMMARY ANNUAL REPORT IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL PARTICIPANTS. PARTICIPANTS ARE ABLE TO REQUEST THE AUDITOR'S REPORT AND OTHER FINANCIAL INFORMATION FROM THE PLAN ADMINISTRATOR AND/OR THE US DEPARTMENT OF LABOR. ALSO, FORM 5500 IS OPEN TO PUBLIC INSPECTION THROUGH THE US DEPARTMENT OF LABOR.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
